goody.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: something that is nice to eat
goody.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: We bought lots of goodies for the picnic.
goody.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The competition gives you the chance to win all sorts of goodies.
goody.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a word used by children to express pleasure or excitement
